name: Lost in Orbit
description:
Conquer obstacles, collect gear, and face your fears to escape a doomed spaceship.

This is my second game I've made in Unity. It is a 2D pixel style platformer.

There are some bugs, and the second level is particularly broken, but I think in comparison to my last game, it's definitely a step up. And of course I am learning and getting better, as well as implementing new elements into my games, such as animations.  For my next project I think I'm gonna go to 3D, and I want to focus on polish, and maintaining a better work ethic.

Thank you for viewing my game, and I hope you enjoy it!
